english_example_sentence: You supposedly took that beautiful book from the library yesterday.
russian_example_sentence: Ты, предположительно, взял ту красивую книгу из библиотеки вчера.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen dün kütüphaneden o güzel kitabı almışsın.
